programme.title: Mixed Dinghy Medal Race - MX Multihull Medal Race - Men's & Women's Kitesurfing SFs A & B, Finals Heats 1, 2 | Sailing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Marseille Marina - Corniche, and Marseille Marina - Frioul, on 07/08/24.
In Mixed Dinghy, Vadlau/Maehr (AUT) won Gold, Okada/Yoshioka (JPN) won Silver and Dahlberg/Karlsson (SWE) won Bronze.
In Mixed Multihull, Tita/Banti (ITA) won Gold, Majdalani/Bosco (ARG) won Silver and Wilkinson/Dawson (NZL) won Bronze.
In Women's Kite, Eleanor Aldridge (GBR) won Gold, Laudriane Nolot (FRA) won Silver and Annelous Lammerts (NED) won Bronze.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's Greco-Roman & Women's Freestyle - Day 12 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Greco-Roman 67kg and 87kg Semifinals and the Greco-Roman 77kg and 97kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 53kg Semifinals and the Freestyle 50kg Finals.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Women's -57kg & Men's -68kg Repechages/Finals | Taekwondo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's -57kg & Men's -68kg Repechages/Finals which took place at the Grand Palais on 08/08/24.
The Women's -57Kg was won by Yujin Kim (KOR) with Gold, Nahid Kiyanichandeh (IRI) with Silver and a tie in Bronze by Skylar Park (CAN) and Alizadeh Kimia (BUL).
The Men's -68kg was won by Ulugbek Rashitov (UZB) with Gold, Zaid Kareem (JOR) with Silver and Bronze for Yushuai Liang (CHN) and Edival Pontes (BRA).

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Javelin Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Javelin Throw Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 08/08/2024. Arshad Nadeem (PAK) won the Golden Medal, Neeraj CHOPRA (IND) Silver Medal and Anderson PETERS (GRN) Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Women's Long Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Long Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 08/08/2024. Tara DAVIS-WOODHALL (USA) won the Gold medal, Malaika MIHAMBO (GER) won the Silver medal and Jasmine MOORE (USA) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10Km Marathon Swimming Race was held on 08/08/2024 at Paris Pont Alexandre III. Sharon Van Rouwendaal (NED) claimed Gold with a time of 2:03:34.2, Moesha Johnson (AUS) took Silver andGinevra Taddeucci (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Women's Lead Semi-Final, Men's Speed Final | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Boulder & Lead Semi-Final, the Men's Speed Quarter-Final, Men's Speed Semi-Final and the Men's Speed Final which took place at Le Bourget Sport Climbing Venue on 08/08/24.
The Men's Speed Final was won by Veddriq Leonardo (INA) with Gold, Wu Peng (CHN) with Silver and Sam Watson (USA) with Bronze.

programme.title: Heats, Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals & Finals | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Canoe Single 200m Heats, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Men's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Canoe Single 200m Quarter-Finals, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals and the Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 08/08/24.
The Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals were won by Liu Hao/Ji Bowen (CHN) with Gold, Gabriele Casadei/Carlo Tacchini (ITA) with Silver and Joan Antoni Moreno/Diego Dominguez (ESP) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by New Zealand who won Gold, Germany won Silver and Hungary won Bronze.
The Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by Germany who won Gold, Australia won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: Men's 3m Springboard Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's 3m Springboard Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 08/08/24.
Xie Siyi (CHN) won Gold, Wang Zongyuan (CHN) won Silver and Osmar Olvera Ibarra (MEX) took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: GER-NED Men's Gold Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place on 08/08/2024 at Yves-du-Manoir Stadium, Paris. Netherlands claimed Gold over Germany.

programme.title: Men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Final | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 05/08/24. Li Yuehong (CHN) won Gold with a total of 32 points, Cho Yeongjae (KOR) won Silver and Wang Xinjie (CHN) won Bronze.
